entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 1:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
